entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
